repairedDockerfile:
FROM phusion/baseimage:latest
MAINTAINER Sergey Arkhipov <serge@aerialsounds.org>

ENV DEBIAN_FRONTEND noninteractive

# Add Vagrant insecure public key
# Taken from Vagrant itself: https://github.com/mitchellh/vagrant/tree/master/keys
RUN echo 'ssh-rsa  vagrant insecure public key' >> ~/.ssh/authorized_keys

RUN apt-get -qq update
RUN apt-get -qq upgrade -y
RUN apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y -qq git curl && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
RUN apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y -qq bash zsh fish && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

RUN curl -f -L https://install.ohmyz.sh | sh || true
RUN chsh -s /usr/bin/zsh
